amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in Part B of House Report 116-143 as en bloc No. 8: Nos. 191, 192, 193, 194, 195, 196, 197, 198, 199, 200, 201, 202, 203, 204, 205, 206, 207, 208, 209, 210, 211, 212, 213, 214, and 215.
